block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 按下按钮时 LED 亮起 ON LED when push button pressed

block.comment: 在这里添加一个短暂的 0.1-0.2 延迟是一种很好的做法 因为当里面有多个这样的循环而没有延迟时 程序可能会因为循环速度太快而变慢 it is a good practice to add a short 0.1-0.2 delay here because when there is multiple such loops without delay inside the program may slow down because it is looping too fast

scripts.comment: 检查按钮是否按下 check for pressing of push button

custom-block.comment: 验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap

scripts.comment: 数字输入使用此图块 从下拉列表中选择输入引脚 可以单击该块以获取引脚处输入的值 Digital Input use this block Select the input pin from the drop down list Can click on the block to get the value of the input at the pin

custom-block.comment: 在引脚 GPIO26 处获取数字输入 get digital input at pin GPIO26

scripts.comment: 如果我们按住按钮 点击这个图块将得到“0” if we press and hold the push button click on this block will get "0"

注意，这个圆角矩形块是一个“汇报者”图块，不能直接连接到其他图块 它必须作为图块的值放入其他图块中 Note that this rounded rectangle block is a "Reporter" block which cannot be connected directly to other blocks It must be drop into other blocks as the value of the block
